Illustration is goodshit. Story is meh. Mates, I'm kinda sad for all these wasted works of these amazing artists. Idc if it's cheating, rape, loli, shota, feet, necrophilia, or whatever other weird kink there is. Be it parody or original. As long as the story is more compelling, it'll be more artistic and have the potential to ascend in meme realm like 177013. This meta of hypno-ntr/hypno-rape plot scheme without other info to spice up the art. It's getting pretty old. The demographic that'll still bust their nut for something this bland and overused are virgins who have no confidence that they'll have a shot to fuck a person... Which.. is.. the majority of the consumer in this industry so I guess it can't be helped that it's quantity over quality since the hentai mangakas need decent earnings....... Goddammit. Bruh, can anyone atleast recommend me something in their library with both good illustration and story?
